name: Watch your step (thomasjammes)
description:
--------------------WATCH YOUR STEP-----------------------

Bring the character to the orange step in 20 puzzles.  

Use cards values to move him through the stairs.

But Watch your step! Black steps will make you start all over!

-------------------------------------------------------------

Game done for the Trijam #171 "Watch your step"

Core gameplay & art done in 3H

Menuig, Level design, sound FX & Music takes me 3h or 4h more hours

Thanks!
